definition: tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies
fence/railing/hurdle/column or box (of text or other data)

sentences.english: They could soon take it to the next level by excising the traditional navigation toolbar.
sentences.chinese: 下一步他們很快就會把手伸向現存的傳統導航工具欄。

sentences.english: Here’s a closeup of the toolbar.
Also supports translucent and auto hide for toolbar.
sentences.chinese: 還支持半透明和自動隱藏工具欄。

sentences.english: You can update the status of a command item in the menubar or toolbar.
sentences.chinese: 您可以更新的菜單欄或工具欄命令的項目的狀態。

sentences.english: Returns any changes made to the toolbars back todefault.
sentences.chinese: 返回回默認工具欄的取消你的任何更改。

sentences.english: The toolbar also supplies an icon to re-run the existing report.
sentences.chinese: 工具欄也提供了一個圖標來重新運行現存的報表。

sentences.english: A platform selection drop-down list box will appear in the main tool bar.
sentences.chinese: 主工具欄中會出現一個平臺選擇下拉列表框。

sentences.english: Using this toolbar, the user can now add fields and adjust the table.
sentences.chinese: 使用該工具欄，用戶可以添加字段和調整表。

sentences.english: Time tracking reports are now accessible from the main toolbar.
sentences.chinese: 時間跟蹤報告現在可以從主工具欄訪問。

sentences.english: The toolbars and menu bar are configured on a per-perspective basis.
sentences.chinese: 工具欄和菜單欄都是基於透視圖配置的。

sentences.english: Indicates that your application contains a draggable menu bar and a toolbar.
sentences.chinese: 指示應用程序包含可拖動的菜單欄和工具欄。

sentences.english: I highly suggest adding Tick Tock Timer to your toolbar if possible.
sentences.chinese: 我強烈建議在你的工具欄里加一下定時器。

sentences.english: On the bottom tool-bar on the lower screen you find the main-menu items.
sentences.chinese: 在底部工具欄上的較低的屏幕找到主菜單項。

sentences.english: If they are fixed, they may overlap the sidebar.
sentences.chinese: 如果這個欄寬度是固定的，可能會與工具欄交迭。

sentences.english: Actually, you can add actions to buttons and toolbars, too.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，也可以給按鈕和工具欄添加操作。

sentences.english: This toolbar icon also indicates whether the debugger is on or off.
sentences.chinese: 這個工具欄圖標還指出調試器是否處於打開狀態。

definition: to click (using a mouse or other pointing device)
to drag/to tow/(computing) to drag (mouse operation)
